name: platfo (demo)
description:
this is a 2d platformer game i made with godot game engine.  you can download this game and source code for free available for window and android. 

on window => A key to move left, D key to move right, UP key to jump, LEFT key to dash  and RIGHT key to attack

the assets for this game i use from this link, if you dont want your assets being use, you can contact me and i will immediately delete this game from this website

https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack
